You look at him incredulously, "I have Slivariana, and if you are afraid of us attacking then you will just have to trust us to not do so." You say as you sheath your sword. "Besides I am not going to let you just take us prisoner."
You cross your arms and watch what this rider may do or say.

"Fine, then come along. There is one that could say if you are free as you say you are." He said and mounted his dragon.

You hear from Slivariana, it was the other dragoness, 'I still want to know why you both smell of sex.'

Slivariana turned her head so that she could look at you, as if asking if she should.

You...
12121322111122212111212112121222111111.title: UMMMMMMMMM ya don't wana know

121213221111222121112121121212221111111.content:
You shrug,
I mean what's the worst that could happen
She nods and explains it to saphira who looks appalled for a moment before thinking about it for a moment
'Hmmmmm that would feel nice, I shall have to talk to my rider about this....maybe he can help me out with, a problem I've been having.' You hear through Silvirinnia.
As we land Eragon has the guards take us to the person Eragon was talking about. While he and saphira left for a clearing that they could have a bit of privacy in.
The person in question was a female... elf...

(note it is when they are headed to the forest of the elves.)
121213221111222121112121121212221111111.title: Say go ahead

1212132211112221211121211212122211111112.content:
"I am telling you that me and Silvirinnia want to leave, we do not work for the king." I say to her
"And there is a high possibility that you are lying, and I am not going to put myself at risk trying to search out the truth, you will be with us till Elesmere, and there we will find out if you and her are free or not, then you will train there, regardless of what you want to do." The elf said. I didn't want anything to do with this, but the bindings that the elf made were impossible to break and well under threat that I would be hurt Silvirinnia didn't do anything to save me from this as it seemed that I would not be 'hurt' if she cooperated...
I sighed and laid back on the bed they provided me... I hope that this will not be permanent. And after this Elesmere we will leave.
1212132211112221211121211212122211111112.title: Follow main character

1212132211112221211121211212122211111112.content:
Well being dragged along for a journey wasn't fun, as I wasn't trusted I was left with them on the boat and Silverinnia was left to follow, yes she could go off, but only under Saphira's supervision.

I was just going to have to just sit it out as I had been doing. Eragon did talk with me, but only with Arya, as they believed I was under the influence of King Galbatorix. And they didn't believe me when I said I wasn't. So it was just left to be as we sailed down the river to this Elesmere.

Eventually we stopped at a port and had to continue on ground to get there. I was on a pony still tied up so it was a slow journey. Reaching the edge of the great elf forest....

I sigh as I bet that there will be more missery on this journey.
1212132211112221211121211212122211111112.title: The journey to Elesmere

1212132211112221211121211212122211111112.content:
At the boarders of the forest Arya... she spoke in a language that you had no understanding of... and even though Silverinnia could get the meaning she couldn't translate it for you.

After saying one more word elves appeared all around the clearing... and from there you were surrounded as Arya gave some sort of command and you and Silverinnia were lead a ways away... after that several Elves came near you and Arya appeared...

"I decided since we are here that we can scan your mind... and if you are found to be in league with Galbatorix then we will end you and her... but if not. Then... I will only ask that you accompany us to Ellesmere where you may train and help us against him." She said before placing a hand on your head... After that, you felt pain as if someone was prying apart your head... you groan in pain, Silverinnia growls in sympathy, she couldn't interfere in fear of them killing you... not exactly a good position for either of you...

Time passed, your skin crawled as your early memories were scanned over... and after that, next was your teen years... and after that the events that led to you having Silverinnia, and the events afterwards... surprisingly the events where you were inside of her were... in a word blanked out as if someone removed them... you remembered what happened... but from this view they were not there... You wonder if it was Silverinnia or some sort of magic that made it invisible to others...

After what seemed like an hour you were released from her hold and she looked at you.
"So... You are a free rider. So please. Don't let Eragon shoulder the burden of being a Rider alone. Please there is much to be had should you help us." She asked... like after being examined like that made it better that you were now free to do what you wanted... you sighed and looked to her..
1212132211112221211121211212122211111112.title: no

12121322111122212111212112123.content: So what would you like to try with her?
12121322111122212111212112123.title: try something else with her

121213221111222121112121121232.content:
You look at your dragon's lips wondering if you and her could live hidden from all the hubbub... If it was possible could you live out your days inside of her?
You want to see if she can take you in first... she for some reason regardless of how she tried just couldn't get you into her folds... but you want to try... You start by rubbing her lips... she purrs at your touch... you smile and rub them more... then slip in your hand... she purrs and spreads her legs... You push your other hand in... spreading her wider... she let you as you slipped between her lips... more of you went into her... she purred and let you... till you felt only your lower legs outside of her... you pull them in as she wakes up...
Hammond? Are you in me?
'Yes I am Slivariana. It is nice in here.'
She purred, I am glad you like it. I think that you would enjoy being in me...
121213221111222121112121121232.title: Unbirth

1212132211112221211121211212321.content:
"Well you are so soft in here... could I live in here? and could we go away from Alagesia?"
I would like to fight... but if that is your wish then I will.
I smile and snuggle into her soft folds... as I felt her move a bit... she must be picking up the baggage... After that her womb tenses and she jumps into the air...
1212132211112221211121211212321.title: propose to live in her
